name: Dorojiai
description:
Dorojiai ❔What is this game?
  • It's a game created for the manga "Shangri-La Frontier" competition "Shit Game Competition".
💬Synopsis

You are a Mudfrog living in a bog. I don't know if it's because of the way you behave as a species, but you have always had a strong desire to spew mud on humanity. Let's go ahead and sling mud at every player who walks by!

There is no denying the danger of death.

📚Rules
  • When the Mudfrog lands in a muddy area, it will spray mud all over the area depending on its jump level.
  • If the mud crashes into the player, the score is added.
  • Once the mud is sprayed, the player will start attacking the mud frog, so try to avoid the attacks and hit the mud frog!
🎮Controls
  • WASD or Directional Key or Mouse Cursor: Determine direction
  • Click and release the mouse or spacebar to jump.
  • There are four levels of jumping depending on how long you hold down the mouse.
🔍What we're using
  • Python
  • Pyxel
  • cx_Freeze

GitHub:https://github.com/AlageZ/Dorojiai
